metadata.title: CVE-2016-2385 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the encode_msg function in encode_msg.c inthe SEAS module in Kamailio (formerly OpenSER and SER) before 4.3.5 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption andprocess crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a large SIP packet.

criterions.comment: kamailio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
